WHG

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • WHG.Block
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedBlock, Ball, Coin, Square, Wall

    public abstract class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is used for a basic block in the game, including balls, walls, coins, and the square.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Block(double myX, double myY, double w, double h, javafx.scene.paint.Color col)
      Initialization constructor to construct a basic block in the game.

      This boolean will return true or false based on if a collision is happening.

      This method is used to convert each block into a Rectangle so that the intersects method can be used in the checkCollision method.

      This is used to get the color of the block.

        Parameters:
        myX - is the x position.
        myY - is the y position.
        w - is the width.
        h - is the height.
        col - is the color.

      • onCollision

        public abstract void onCollision(Block block)
        This abstract method will be used by the blocks to see if a block is colliding with another block.
        Parameters:
        block - is the block that will be checked with for a collision with another block.

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(Block block)
        This boolean will return true or false based on if a collision is happening.
        Parameters:
        block - is the block that will be checked with for a collision with another block.
        Returns:
        true or false based on if a block is intersecting with another block.

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
        This method is used to convert each block into a Rectangle so that the intersects method can be used in the checkCollision method.
        Returns:
        a new Rectangle with the instance variables as the x, y, width, and height, all casted as integers as the instance variables are doubles.
